short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The fastest way to get an inspirational quote in your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With just one click, a motivational quote can help you achieve your goals, build your self-esteem, overcome adversity, and stop procrastinating. 

✓ Completely free with no ads.
✓ No account required – stay anonymous.
✓ Nonintrusive – won't bother you.
✓ Available offline.
